h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Boar After the Crouching Tiger Temple
content: Beating him will reward you with the Snout Mask headgear piece, but you'll also be able to go into the door that's at the top of the slope here. Entering this will trigger a cutscene and you'll be transported to the Kingdom of Sahali.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_2_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Boar After the Crouching Tiger Temple'.
The content is as follows:
Beating him will reward you with the Snout Mask headgear piece, but you'll also be able to go into the door that's at the top of the slope here. Entering this will trigger a cutscene and you'll be transported to the Kingdom of Sahali.
